com.intellij.openapi.components

Annotation Type Storage


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Storage
    See Also:
    Persisting States

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static java.lang.String NOT_ROAMABLE_FILE
      Deprecated. 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean deprecated
      If deprecated: Data will be removed on write.
      boolean exclusive 
      boolean exportable
      Is exportable (Export Settings dialog) regardless of roaming type.
      java.lang.String file
      Deprecated. 
      Use value().
      RoamingType roamingType
      Used by the Settings Repository plugin to determine how application-level settings should be shared between different IDE installations.
      java.lang.Class<? extends StateSplitter> stateSplitter 
      java.lang.Class<? extends StateStorage> storageClass
      Class must have constructor (String fileSpec, ComponentManager componentManager, StateStorageManager storageManager).
      ThreeState useSaveThreshold
      Whether to apply save threshold policy (defaults to true if roamingType is set to DISABLED)
      java.lang.String value
      Relative to component container configuration root path.

    • Field Detail

      • NOT_ROAMABLE_FILE

        @Deprecated
public static final java.lang.String NOT_ROAMABLE_FILE
        Deprecated. 

    • Element Detail

      • file

        @Deprecated
public abstract java.lang.String file
        Deprecated. Use value().
        Default:
        ""

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Relative to component container configuration root path. Consider using shorthand form - @Storage("yourName.xml") (when you need to specify only file path). Consider reusing existing storage files instead of a new one. No one need myriads config files. Related components should reuse storage file.
        See Also:
        StoragePathMacros
        Default:
        ""

      • deprecated

        public abstract boolean deprecated
        If deprecated: Data will be removed on write. And ignored on read if (and only if) new storage exists.
        Default:
        false

      • roamingType

        public abstract RoamingType roamingType
        Used by the Settings Repository plugin to determine how application-level settings should be shared between different IDE installations. You must not store components with different roaming types in one file (value()).
        Default:
        com.intellij.openapi.components.RoamingType.DEFAULT

      • storageClass

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends StateStorage> storageClass
        Class must have constructor (String fileSpec, ComponentManager componentManager, StateStorageManager storageManager). componentManager parameter can have more concrete type - e.g. Module (if storage intended to support only one type).
        Default:
        <error>

      • stateSplitter

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends StateSplitter> stateSplitter
        Default:
        com.intellij.openapi.components.StateSplitterEx.class

      • useSaveThreshold

        public abstract ThreeState useSaveThreshold
        Whether to apply save threshold policy (defaults to true if roamingType is set to DISABLED)
        Default:
        com.intellij.util.ThreeState.UNSURE

      • exclusive

        public abstract boolean exclusive
        Default:
        false

      • exportable

        public abstract boolean exportable
        Is exportable (Export Settings dialog) regardless of roaming type.
        Default:
        false
